attributes.action: No severance payments for minister's who resigning in 2022 or anytime
attributes.additional_details: To stop paying out severance pay

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce amounts and rights to payments for Ministers leaving office: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619918

Suspend leaving payments for Ministers leaving office from July-September 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619922
